snippet.title: 112 Operator -  Pandemic Outbreak Teaser
snippet.description:
Pandemic Outbreak DLC is soon to come on Steam! 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1412761/112_Operator__Pandemic_Outbreak/

About the DLC: Save your city during the pandemic disease. Fight against the time and stop the virus from spreading among citizens. Help the defenseless and remember to look over your units. Emergency services are not immune to the pandemic.

Follow Games Operators:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/gameops
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesOperators
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GamesOperators/
Official Website - http://www.gameops.pl/
Discord - https://discord.gg/R3PMYzY
